entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow this evening with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Cloudy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the evening. Fog patches overnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 18 January 2023
